If you asked me about this game a few months back I would of praised this game above and beyond. The community wasn't great but it was toned down a bit. Here in my opinion is why this game got worse, take it with a grain of salt:

- The Emblem System:
It's great for killers, horrible for survivors. I mainly play survivor so I got the short end of the stick but from time to time I do mess around as the killer. Killer became way more fun than survivor, and it's sad cause it was the other way around. Also it's difficult to pip as the survivor but not difficult at all as killer. Maybe they should of pushed this system after it's been nicely polished and balanced instead of shoving it down our throats.

- Community:
It became super toxic to players fucking with each other or fucking with the killer. I honestly do hate survivors who toy with the killer and t-bag them. Survivors barely work together and even with the emblem trying to force them to work together, it's a big NOPE. (Im guilty of this from time to time)

- Bugs:
TONS of bugs. Some were fixed but it's still not great having to play the game and notice a bug from 6 months ago.

- No Dedicated Servers:
I GET IT GAME DEVS, YOU WANNA SAVE MONEY. But please invest in a dedicated server for games because I can't stand killers with horrible pings (which is a good 85% of them) and able to take advantage of the fact by either forcing themselves to lag. It ruins the game experience. 

I have 240 hours into this game and I used to enjoy and love playing it but now it's just killing me inside. If you feel you can put all these things aside then by all means please buy it, but at the current state it's in I'd rather wait for things to change up or buy another.
Drunk by Daylight. Enough said.

I have played this game a decent amount over the course of its life, Coming back sporadically through the lifetime. While in the first week or two when it was the 3 killers and 4 survivors to choose from, I played this game for hours upon hours, now I can't play it for more than a single match or two. In its current form, it's grown far too much for its own good and this is a classic case of "Less is more." 

With each new killer/character they release, comes new perks that can be learned through the Bloodweb, which sounds great in theory being that new content is usually a welcome thing in the gaming universe. In my personal opinion, all this does is break the balance that game was capable of in the early stages, add convoluted new systems and even more potential for perk abuse. Which leads to my next point.

The community of this game is the most toxic community I've ever seen, next to League of Legends. It's a constant "Us vs Them" mentality between Killer mains and Survivor mains where both sides do nothing but cry and complain about broken perks, abuse of abilities and how easy the other side has it. 

As someone who has played both killer and survivor, my personal opinion is thus. With respawning hooks to negate sabotage, more hooks on the map, ability to kick generators being added, killers have such a distinct advantage that it's actually boring to play as killer because winning every game only stays fun for so long... and as survivor, unless you're playing against a killer who has literally never played before, it's going to be fairly uncommon to actually win in the conventional way.

TLDR: Unbalanced gameplay, toxic community, too much content to allow for balance, and a fanbase too divided to ever allow a happy medium. Pass on this, get yourself something better...

It's a pretty fun little game. I got it when it first was released and it was just filled with bugs and glitches that put a friend of mine off the game, but I still played it. I play it every now and then for when I feel sadistic and want to hunt people. Normally it doesn't last that long since most people I went up against didn't know how to play so they got caught easily.

Other than that, new characters are nice, and the game is still fun.
I would recommend this game.

This game isn't balanced well, and the devs don't seem to be doing much about it. Killers do well in low ranks, but survivors dominate in the high ranks. The competitive ranking system is not only difficult to understand, but poorly implemented, never fully explained, and a lot of it doesn't make much sense. This can make it difficult to increase your rank, even when you have a good game. The bottom line is: this game just isn't fun to play.

Всем привет. 
В самом начале когда вышла игра я в течении недолгого времени смотрел стримы по этой игре. И в итоге понял что надо брать. Эта игра не имела и до сих пор не имеет аналогов в своем жанре. 4 выживших и один маньяк который хочет всех покрошить, а выжившие хотят убежать. Смотря, а потом уже играя в нее ты испытываешь большой приток адреналина и желания выжить, играя за выжившего. Но если ты играешь за маньяка тобой движет желание крови, желание поймать всех и в зависимости от подношений убить самым что не на есть изощренным способом. Рассказывать про механику нет смысла тут приходит понимание во время игры, но командное взаимодействие порой творит чудеса, если ты играешь за выжившего. У маньяка все просто. Поймать,повесить,убить и покрамсать. Я в игре можно сказать с момента ее выхода и ни разу не пожалел о ее покупке.Да конечно менялись какие-то механики, исправлялись баги, но эта игра не стала от этого хуже. Всем советую кто хочет после тяжелого трудового дня придти и выпустить пар. Just do it

This is a review coming from a Wraith killer main. I've had this game for over a year and a half now and have achieved a total of over 1,000 hours on this game. The game at it's current state is not worth it but it COULD improve as time goes on. Theres many cases ive encountered as bugs or exploits within the game such as spots were survivor can pass but the killer cannot or a killer cannot progress further into a match. That doesn't make up all of it the toxicity of the survivors or killers can be enough to drive a man mad. As for now ive been banned and have yet to receive a reasoning for it. In conclusion if you're interested in this thrilling pallet looping simulator I'd say hop right in.

*UPDATE*
The game still hase issues with connection and some people being bad and having to hack but other then that the game is still fun regardless. I would advise if you have a friend that plays this game play with them if you want to play survivor but if you prefer killer then go ahead and play killer but note early killers tend to lose when they dont know fully what to do or how to play the killer

I purchsed this game late on in its life cycle adn to be quite honest that dosnt botter me one bit. With the hours that i have played every match is diffrent with each playstyle of each individual player. I can recomend this game weather you have friends to play it with or if you are going to play it solo as there is always something to do wheather you trying to get a killer  or a suvivor to max rank or just wanting to bet that infamous rank 1 killer there is always fun times to be had.

With all the good like anything i have come across a few bad parts but that wouldnt make me stop playing the game at all. Most of the issues that i have come across is people whom use cheats or hacks just so that they can get an easy win. That being said they are few and far between but needs to be said so people whom may be looking into buying this know what could happen. This may not be an issue but as a side note that may turn somepeople is there is a diffrent skill level for this game but nothing you cant adjust to if you have played anyother multiplayer game.

All that being said this game is one of the funnest games i have played regardless if i endup dieing early or something like that. If you looking for a game where you can play out killing 4 survivors or running for you life trying to get the killer this is deffintly the only game that fits that list ( yes i just decribed the game XD ) Honestly though if you looking for a fun game when you can just jump in and have some fun right off the bat DEAD BY DAYLIGHT will provide that.
游戏的可玩性很高，多样性的玩法，丰富了游戏的乐趣！

EDIT 10/23: Holy shit. Not only have they essentially removed the Halloween event in a HORROR game, in order to appease the masses they're giving free in-game currency away and discounting the BRAND NEW Halloween event skins. This means not only are you able to earn 1 less free skin than previous years, but if you bought the BRAND NEW EVENT EXCLUSIVE skins when the EVENT started, you're out 12,000 currency and they WILL NOT REFUND YOU.
I have never seen a company shoot themselves in the foot so fast.




A fun game ruined by a cancerous, toxic community and a dev team who think the 4 in a 1v4 game are supposed to be the strong ones.

EDIT: LMAO they've made it even worse with the last patch, while stubbornly keeping their heads up their own asses and refusing to admit they're bad at balancing their game. Not only did they nuke Ruin because "80% of killers are using it" instead of looking at "Why are 80% of killers using it?", now they're just completely throwing away the entire ranking system they made a year ago that everyone hated and said sucked because BIG SURPRISE: it sucks and doesn't actually provide useful information with which to form a ranking system. And it gets better because the new system will be totally hidden and you won't get to see how it works. Just trust them. Trust them and buy their new seasonal passes for cosmetics.

el juego en lo personal es muy adictivo, obviamente mas en lo cooperativo, jugar con amigos es donde mas se disfruta.
como killer una vez encuentras tu asesino favorito con las habilidades que se ajusten a tu modo de cazar es cuando mas disfrutas
el problema que yo mas le veo al juego es la comunidad que lo juega, pues el asesino muchas de las veces (por no decir casi siempre) no quiere perder o no acepta perder, es decir o campea de principio a fin o juega la partida bien usando sus habilidades y al ver que aun asi perdera se pasa al lado oscuro y campea
resumiendo, el jugador  no se divierte. Yo no le veo diversion a ser toxico y arruinar la experiencia a los demas jugadores, hay que apreder a ganar y tambien a perder pues solo asi uno mejora en un juego multijugador
despues se puede mencionar lo tipico de que hay partidas con mucho lag errores y bugs que te joden etc..
pero queria remarcar el problema mas grave que yo veo en este juego
Ojala la comunidad cambiara y se jugara para divertirse mas y no joder a los demas jugadores, ademas los killer tiene perks muy chetas como para campear.
pero bueno aun asi si te gusta lo juegas y de mi parte aunque a veces la paso mal lo seguire jugando porque no hay muchos juegos tan buenos de este estilo, se lo recomiendo a los jugadores que jueguen mucho con amigos, de verdad lo van a disfrutar mas y al jugador solitario solo si el juego le gusta mucho porque si no van a sufrir mucho xD
PD: No Se Vuelvan Toxicos :)

Купил игру в конце 2017 года в декабре, по началу все работало удовлетворительно, а в последнее время начиная с апреля месяца  2018года зайти в игру стало практически невозможно, выдает ошибки о невозможности подключиться к онлайн службам, то невозможно проверить на EAC, сполошные проблемы с сетью хотя у меня ничего не менялось, я разочарован((((

クソゲーです。ランクもはじめから２０と初心者にはおすすめできません。お金を返して下さい。
身内とやっても鬼側が有利すぎて全く楽しめません。３人で始まったときは最後の一人になっても脱出ハッチあかなかったりとかなり鬼側が有利です。もしプレイされる場合は鬼側で煽りながらプレイをするのがいいでしょう。

從遊戲初代就購買遊玩，也看得出來官方想盡辦法平衡遊戲機制，但主場終究是鬼的地盤
我不是很明白目前這種治癒帶滿擋鬼檔刀扛人到底是不是一個很好的遊戲機制
每一場下來就是會有那種故意捉弄鬼的，扛一個另外三個在妳旁邊晃呀晃，企圖卡位妨礙
檔刀檔勾卡位的都有，只能說遊戲體驗極差
不守屍，前腳剛走，掛勾的馬上拉下來，結算以後在罵Camper

不針對點，遇到會玩的倖存者，鬼基本上勝率低得可以

好一點點的場抓到一個，差一點的一個都沒有
R16以後的鬼排很難上，基本上會玩的倖存者一點也不怕鬼，
正大光明的挑釁你，反正出事了隊友會來幫妳檔刀檔勾甚至送你出門
很難接受這種目前遊戲機制的風氣，靠卡位漏洞上位

盼望有朝一日官方會看到這篇評論，能夠盡早改進目前的亂象

p.s. also camping is awful

Rating: 7/10

TL:DR; Can be a fun and rewarding experience, othertimes mildly frustrating.. Good with friends, random with... randomers. Overall the game runs okay, but can be a bit flakey and certain parts still need addressing.

Now, for the juicy somewhat detailed version. 

Dead By Daylight generally is a decent game, that can be fun for friends to play (as survivors), though you will need an external voice chat IF you wish to talk. (I'll say now the game wasn't designed to be played originally with friends, but feel this is a feature they added and makes somewhat sense) The in-game options are to point away or to come here. If you plan to play solo, you're more better off as a killer than a survivor but you can still do that, but the quality of your game is very dependent on who you get with you. Most of the players are pretty sweet, however there are a few salty/toxic players which do ruin the game for everyone.

The characters do have some interesting perks, which it's quite nice that they become teachable so you can use your perks with other survivors/killers. My only issue is there's not enough perk options. Some are okay when you have nothing else, but as you level up and prestige, you'll generally end up using a variation of about 8 different perks at most and the remainder are pointless, unless you're chasing achievements or want to increase the difficulty for yourself.. I would say possibly killers have a little bit more and better variety in this sense but it's minimal.

The game runs via peer to peer and really does need some dedicated servers, most games are fine.. but sometimes pings can be horrible, the odd kick out, etc. can leave much to be desired. On top of this, there can be a lot of lobby dodging from Killers, which again can be frustrating when you're having to wait 10 mins or more for a single game. There's also times playing as killer, that i end up changing to survivor simply because no one joins the lobby.

Overall the game is fun and the developers are still giving this some love after almost 2 years, however it does need some more work done to it, but I doubt this will happen with the move to a new game... The point system which recently got revamped is a nice idea but still marginally flawed, the skins are a little lame at times with events very sparingly used and some of the decisions haven't been for the better. But if you don't take the game too seriously and just want some fun, either solo or with friends, then this is a decent game and not the worse by any means.

This game is one of its kind. There are other games which bear a resemblance to Dead by daylight but those are nothing but a cheap imitation of it, as it was the first to come out.
In terms of playability, devs are all time coming up with new innovations by nerfing or buffing perks/survivors/maps which might prove to be effective or not, like everything, right?
游戏不错，继续加油
